pages.title: Clown Triggerfish
pages.text: The clown triggerfish ($(o)Balistoides conspicillum$()), also known as the bigspotted triggerfish, is a demersal marine fish belonging to the family Balistidae, or commonly called triggerfish.

pages.title: Clown Triggerfish
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
